CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: For ( PCPDTBT ) , which showed absorption in the range 380-900 nm in the AM 1.5 G spectrum , good hole mobility ( 0.01 - 0.1 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 ) and a high power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) of 3.2% with PC71BM as the electron acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

Sure, I can help you identify the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph. Here are the entities I found:

1. PCPDTBT - This is a material name, which stands for "Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) (PEDOT):Polystyrene Sulfonate (PSS)".
2. PC71BM - This is also a material name, which stands for "PC71BM is a type of organic molecule commonly used as an electron acceptor in organic solar cells."

So, the two material names mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. PCPDTBT
2. PC71BM
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the material names mentioned in the paragraph:

1. PCPDTBT
2. PC71BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the material names mentioned in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCPDTBT |
| PC71BM |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
